metadata.name: Screen Capture - macOS
metadata.comment: Detects attempts to use screencapture to collect macOS screenshots

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.name) = lower('/usr/sbin/screencapture'))

output.summary: Detects attempts to use screencapture to collect macOS screenshots

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate user activity taking screenshots References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1113/T1113.md, https://github.com/EmpireProject/Empire/blob/08cbd274bef78243d7a8ed6443b8364acd1fc48b/lib/modules/python/collection/osx/screenshot.py
